review: A beautifully designed OSD makes navigating between multiple sites (like Hulu, Netflix, Amazon...) brilliantly smooth and easy. It's fast, simple, and has a great remote. If you've ever used a streaming bluray player or smart tv, most of the time the navigation is awful. This thing even works nicer than my computer.I only have one minor gripe with the remote design: it's a slick little unit, but I think the "home" button is too close to the "pause" button. I hit it accidentally all the time. I wish they'd change that.
author: R "sir_rob79"

review: There is a big difference. Roku allows Amazon as just one more content provider, but lacks the control and management, and the ease of use that comes from Amazon, for Amazon Instant Video. As just one example, you cannot remove recently viewed movies from the screen of Roku. This and many more management tools are automatically part of the Fire TV Stick user experience. Small, works perfectly, excellent quality images and Instant Prime - centric. Returned Roku and never been happier with a replacement product that better meets my needs.
author: D. J. Donaldson

review: Love it - does just what it says.

review: Received before stated time. I had difficultly putting the batteries in the remote, but after that it was a breeze to setup and use. Will buy an additional unit for my lake cottage. When I say it was easy to setup and use, I am in my earlier 70s and I did not have any problems other than the battery installation. Thanks amazon for a well made and easy to use product.
